table.name: ROLES
table.description: It contains the roles of our app

table.name: APP_USER
table.description: Users of the app

column.name: USER_ID
column.description: This is Sas generated Unique id for each page on Marketing Application

column.name: ACTIVATED
column.description: Used for Zoho one check and denotes the ServiceOrgmember status, where is_Active denotes activeOrdeleted

table.name: TOUR
table.description: It contains the FEATURES of our app

table.name: FEATURES
table.description: It contains the FEATURES of our app

table.name: ROLE_FEATURES
table.description: Role Feature mapping

column.name: PROJECT_INTEGRATION_TYPE
column.description: If PROJECT_INTEGRATION_TYPE != 0 then this project has been created by different services like desk etc

table.name: RUNNING_EXPERIMENTS
table.description: Backing up of running experiments during license pause so that experiments can be auto launched during license resume

table.name: EXPERIMENT_EXCLUDED_IN_TRACKING_SCRIPT
table.description: Mapping for experiments that needs to be excluded in tracking script. It is added to satisfy an usecase in integration with Zoho Landing Pages

column.name: SIGNIFICANCE_LEVEL
column.description: Significance level required for the experiment

column.name: IS_HEATMAP_ENABLED
column.description: Flag to indicate if heatmap is enabled or not

column.name: REDIRECT_PARAMS
column.description: Used only for split to decide whether to redirect url parameters to variation or not

column.name: SESSION_TIME
column.description: Step time in milliseconds. By default it will be 2 hours.

table.name: EVENTS
table.description: Base table for event

column.name: IS_DATA_TRACKED
column.description: For MH purpose - to handle data collection start date

table.name: RUNNING_GOALS
table.description: Backing up of running goals during license pause so that goals can be auto launched during license resume

table.name: TEMPLATE_TABLE_META
table.description: Table for maintaining meta details of the session recording buffer table

table.name: SR_DFS_MAPPINGS
table.description: Table to maintain DFS folder and blockId details which is eligible for deletion

column.name: COLUMN_NAME
column.description: Column in the table that should be archived

column.name: GROUP_BY_COLUMNS
column.description: columns which should be grouped while archiving. For multiple columns use comma seperator

column.name: VISITOR_IDS_TABLE
column.description: table containing the mapping of group to the array of visitors

column.name: DURATION_TYPE
column.description: Duration type. As of now only hourly and daily table are available

column.name: MODULE_TYPE
column.description: Module type. Visitor or Goal achieved table

column.name: LAST_ARCHIEVED_TIME
column.description: Specifies archive duration. As of now only hourly and daily type are there

column.name: IS_STANDARD_DIMENSION
column.description: Boolean flag to determine standard dimension or dynamic attribute

column.name: LAST_ARCHIEVED_TIME
column.description: Specifies archive duration. As of now only hourly and daily type are there

column.name: MODULE_TYPE
column.description: Module type of the raw table - Visitor/Goal achieved

column.description: This column gives us information whether the indexes are zoho's portal or not
